org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt

Class SchematicSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt.AbstractSimulation
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt.SchematicSimulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Simulation

    public class SchematicSimulation
extends AbstractSimulation
    This class provides an implementation of the procedure SchematicSimilarity1 in [Monika Rauch Henzinger, Thomas A. Henzinger, Peter W. Kopke: Computing Simulations on Finite and Infinite Graphs. FOCS 1995: 453-462]. Note that the alphabet of the input automaton must be non-empty.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

      • Fields inherited from class org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt.AbstractSimulation

      Constructs this object to compute the direct simulation relation of states in an automaton.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SchematicSimulation

        public SchematicSimulation(FSA aut)
        Constructs this object to compute the direct simulation relation of states in an automaton.
        Parameters:
        aut - where the simulation relations should be computed

      • SchematicSimulation

        public SchematicSimulation(FSA aut,
                           boolean b)
        Constructs this object to compute the direct simulation relation of states in an automaton. The boolean argument indicates whether the fair state simulation should be considered.
        Parameters:
        aut - where the simulation relations should be computed
        b - a boolean indicating whether the fair state simulation should be considered
